Wallpaper hanging Auckland

Jason Roxburgh treats each customer with the utmost care, and respect for their home. He is not satisfied until each and every customer is completely happy with his wallpaper hanging work.

Some Auckland homeowners have had this to say about his wallpaper installation at their place:

What our customers say…

We are thrilled with our mural, and the installer (Jason) was just fantastic and turned up immediately to help out.
Thanks again for another great job. 

Toni Brown –    July 2020

Thanks Jason, it looks beautiful! Delighted to have worked with you on this. I hope that I can call on your services again soon. 

Yvette, February 2020

Thank you very much for your  prompt service. The job has been done to perfection. I am very happy with the result. Will contact you when we need further work.  Many thanks, Kind regards 

Colleen, July 2019 

Hi Jason thanks for to-day – we are so impressed with how the paper looks Tris and I have decided that we would like to do the other side of the wall.

Emma, July 2019 

Hi Jason raced home at lunch time to see the wallpaper. It looks great. Thank u 

 Maree, May 2019

Great thank you so much. Everyone seems to like it. I can’t thank you enough for doing it last minute.

 Pippa, January 2018

Thanks so much Jason, much appreciated. You do an awesome job.
Cheers,

 Adrienne, March 2018

Thanks for such a wonderful and conscientious job! It looks amazing.

Sonia, Aug 2017

Hi Jason, Thank you so much for the fabulous job you have done for us.
We really appreciate how hard you work and the surface is great for us.

Michelle & Leonard, May 2017

Jason hung paper for us in tricky shaped lobby area and a feature bedroom wall. He’s punctual and friendly, the finish was flawless, and he was clean & tidy in the house. I’d highly recommend if you require a perfect job with expensive paper.

Nicholas Gant, March 2017

Many thanks Jason, Wallpaper looks fantastic
Regards, Anthony

Anthony Leighs, September 2016 

Thanks very much Jason… fantastic work & my wallpaper murals looks stunning. Will surely recommend to others.

Sep 2016

Checked it our last night and all looks great. Thanks for your help and flexibility.
All the best, Cheers Martin

Martin LAUDER, May 2016 

Hi Jason, thanks so much for a great job papering the wardrobe, love it & will recommend you to friends.

Debbi, June 2016,

Get the knowledge, tools, and expertise that will leave your place looking great. Call us for the wallpaper hangers Auckland homeowners have relied on for over 25 years. If you are outside central Auckland but would like a true professional to tackle your tricky wall hanging job, Jason still may be able to help.
